channel.title: Chris Christmas Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Christmas Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: free ipod
item.description: so everyone is asking me how I got the free ipod. well. iw ill detail the steps: I went to freeipods.com and signed up (june) I posted the referer info to all my friends - no one did it ;) I posted the referer info to nata2.info ( a pretty high bandwidth site) and a lot of people signed up and no one completed the offer.
